Verses: 1 eesaakku Mudhirvayadhaanadhinaal Avan Kangal Iruladaindhu Paarvaiyatrupponapodhu, Avan Than Mooththa Kumaaranaagiya Esaavai Azhaiththu, En Magane Endraan; Avan, Idho, Irukkiren Endraan.
2 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Mudhirvayadhaanen, En Maranam Inna Naalil Endru Ariyen.
3 aagaiyaal, Nee Un Aayudhangalaagiya Un Amparaaththooniyaiyum Un Villaiyum Eduththukkondu Vanaththukkuppoi, Enakgaaga Vettaiyaadi,
4 adhai Enakkup Piriyamaayirukkira Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaagach Samaiththu, Naan Pusikkavum, Naan Maranamadaiyumunne En Aaththumaa Unnai Aaseervadhikkavum, Ennidaththil Konduvaa Endraan.
5 eesaakku Than Kumaaranaagiya Esaavode Pesugaiyil, Rebekkaal Kettukkondirundhaal. Esaa Vetdaiyaatikkonduvarumpadi Vanaththukkup Ponaan.
6 appozhudhu Rebekkaal Than Kumaaranaagiya Yaakkobai Nokki: Un Thagappan Un Sagodharanaagiya Esaavai Azhaiththu:

7 naan Pusiththu, Enakku Maranam Varumunne, Karththarai Munnittu Unnai Aaseervadhikkumpadi, Nee Enakgaaga Vetdaiyaati, Adhai Enakku Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaagach Samaiththukkonduvaa Endru Sollakketten.
8 aagaiyaal, En Magane, En Sollaik Kettu, Naan Unakkuk Karpikkirapadi Sey.
9 nee Aattumandhaikkup Poi, Irandu Nalla Vellaattukkuttigalaik Konduvaa; Naan Avaigalai Un Thagappanukkup Piriyamaanapadi Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaagach Samaippen.
10 un Thagappan Thaam Maranamadaiyumunne Unnai Aaseervadhikkumpadi Avar Pusippadharku Nee Adhai Avaridaththil Kondupogavendum Endraal.
11 adharku Yaakkobu Than Thaayaagiya Rebekkaalai Nokki: En Sagodharanaagiya Esaa Romam Migundhavan, Naan Romamillaadhavan.
12 oruvelai En Thagappan Ennaith Thadavippaarppaar; Appozhudhu Naan Avarukku Eththanaaik Kaanappattu, Enmel Aaseervaadhaththai Alla, Saabaththai Varappannikkolvene Endraan.
13 adharku Avan Thaai: En Magane, Unmel Varum Saabam Enmel Varattum; En Sollaimaaththiram Kettu, Nee Poi, Avaigalai Ennidaththil Konduvaa Endraal.
14 avan Poi Avaigalaip Pidiththu, Than Thaayinidaththil Konduvandhaan; Avanudaiya Thaai Avan Thagappanukkup Piriyamaanapadi Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaich Samaiththaal.
15 pinbu, Rebekkaal Veettile Thannidaththil Irundha Than Mooththa Maganaagiya Esaavin Nalla Vasdhirangalai Eduththu, Than Ilaiya Maganaagiya Yaakkobukku Uduththi,
16 vellaattukkuttigalin Tholai Avan Kaigalileyum Romamillaadha Avan Kazhuththileyum Pottu;
17 thaan Samaiththa Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaiyum Appangalaiyum Than Kumaaranaagiya Yaakkobin Kaiyile Koduththaal.
18 avan Than Thagappanidaththil Vandhu, En Thagappane Endraan; Adharku Avan: Idho, Irukkiren; Nee Yaar, En Magane Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Than Thagappanai Nokki: Naan Umadhu Mooththa Maganaagiya Esaa; Neer Enakkuch Sonnapadiye Seydhen; Ummudaiya Aaththumaa Ennai Aaseervadhikkumpadi, Neer Ezhundhu Utkaarndhu, Naan Vetdaiyaatikkonduvandhadhaip Pusiyum Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Eesaakkuth Than Kumaaranai Nokki: En Magane, Idhu Unakku Iththanai Seekkiramaai Eppadi Agappattadhu Endraan. Avan: Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Enakku Neridappanninaar Endraan.
21 appozhudhu Eesaakku Yaakkobai Nokki: En Magane, Nee En Kumaaranaagiya Esaadhaano Allavo Endru Naan Unnaith Thadavippaarkkumpadi Kitta Vaa Endraan.
22 yaakkobu Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkandaiyil Kittap Ponaan; Avan Ivanaith Thadavippaarththu: Saththam Yaakkobin Saththam, Kaigalo Esaavin Kaigal Endru Solli,
23 avanudaiya Kaigal Avan Sagodharanaagiya Esaavin Kaigalaippola Romamullavaigalaayirundhapadiyinaale, Innaan Endru Ariyaamal, Avanai Aaseervadhiththu,
24  Nee En Kumaaranaagiya Esaadhaano Endraan; Avan: Naandhaan Endraan.

25 appozhudhu Avan: En Kumaarane, Nee Vetdaiyaadik Konduvandhadhai Naan Pusiththu, En Aaththumaa Unnai Aaseervadhikkumpadi Adhai En Kittak Konduvaa Endraan; Avan Adhaik Kittak Konduponaan; Appozhudhu Avan Pusiththaan; Pirpaadu, Thiraatcharasam Avanukkuk Konduvandhu Koduththaan, Avan Kudiththaan.
26 appozhudhu Avan Thagappanaagiya Eesaakku Avanai Nokki: En Magane, Nee Kitta Vandhu Ennai Muththanjey Endraan.

27 avan Kittappoi, Avanai Muththanjeydhaan; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Vasdhirangalin Vaasanaiyai Mondhu: Idho, En Kumaaranudaiya Vaasanai Karththar Aaseervadhiththa Vayalveliyin Vaasanaiyaippola Irukkiradhu.
28 dhevan Unakku Vaanaththup Paniyaiyum Boomiyin Kozhumaiyaiyum Koduththu, Migundha Dhaaniyaththaiyum Thiraatcharasaththaiyum Thandharuluvaaraaga.

29 janangal Unnaich Sevikkavum Jaadhigal Unnai Vanangavum Kadavargal; Un Sagodhararukku Ejamaanaayiruppaai; Un Thaayin Pillaigal Unnai Vananguvaargal; Unnaich Sabikkiravargal Sabikgappattavargalum, Unnai Aaseervadhikkiravargal Aaseervadhikkappattavargalumaai Iruppaargal Endru Solli Avanai Aaseervadhiththaan.
30 eesaakku Yaakkobai Aaseervadhiththu Mudindhapodhu, Yaakkobu Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkin Samugaththaivittup Purappattavudane, Avan Sagodharanaagiya Esaa Vetdaiyaadi Vandhu Serndhaan.

31 avanum Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalaich Samaiththu, Than Thagappanandaikkuk Konduvandhu, Thagappanai Nokki: Ummudaiya Aaththumaa Ennai Aaseervadhikkumpadi, En Thagappanaar Ezhundhirundhu, Ummudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Naan Vetdaiyaadik Konduvandhadhaip Pusippaaraaga Endraan.
32 appozhudhu Avan Thagappanaagiya Eesaakku: Nee Yaar Endraan; Adharku Avan: Naan Umadhu Mooththa Maganaagiya Esaa Endraan.

33 appozhudhu Eesaakku Migavum Piramiththu Nadungi: Vetdaiyaadi Enakkuk Konduvandhaane, Avan Yaar? Nee Varumunne Avaiyellaavatrilum Naan Pusiththu Avanai Aaseervadhiththene, Avan Aaseervadhikkappattavanaagavum Iruppaan Endraan.
34  Esaa Than Thagappanudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kettavudane, Migavum Manankasandhu Uraththa Saththamittu Alari, Than Thagappanai Nokki: En Thagappane, Ennaiyum Aaseervadhiyum Endraan.
35 adharku Avan: Un Sagodharan Thandhiramaai Vandhu, Unnudaiya Aaseervaadhaththaip Petrukkondaan Endraan.

36 appozhudhu Avan: Avan Peyar Yaakkobu Ennappaduvadhu Sariyallavaa? Idhode Irandudharam Ennai Mosampokkinaan; En Seshta Puththirabaagaththai Eduththukkondaan; Idho, Ippozhudhu En Aaseervaadhaththaiyum Vaangikkondaan Endru Solli; Neer Enakku Oru Aaseervaadhaththaiyaagilum Vaiththuvaikkavillaiyaa Endraan.

37 eesaakku Esaavukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Idho, Naan Avanai Unakku Ejamaanaaga Vaiththen; Avan Sagodharar Ellaaraiyum Avanukku Oozhiyakkaararaagak Koduththu, Avanaith Dhaaniyaththinaalum Thiraatcharasaththinaalum Aadhariththen; Ippozhudhum En Magane, Naan Unakku Enna Seyven Endraan.
38 esaa Than Thagappanai Nokki: En Thagappane, Indha Ore Aaseervaadham Maaththiramaa Ummidaththil Undu? En Thagappane, Ennaiyum Aaseervadhiyum Endru Solli, Esaa Saththamittu Azhudhaan.
39 appozhudhu Avan Thagappanaagiya Eesaakku Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Un Vaasasthalam Boomiyin Saaraththodum Uyara Vaanaththilirundhu Irangum Paniyodum Irukkum.
40 un Pattayaththinaale Nee Pizhaiththu, Un Sagodharanaich Sevippaai; Nee Merkollum Kaalam Varumpodho, Un Kazhuththil Irukkira Avanudaiya Nugaththadiyai Muriththuppoduvaai Endraan.

41 yaakkobaith Than Thagappan Aaseervadhiththadhinimiththam Esaa Yaakkobaip Pagaiththu: En Thagappanukkaagath Dhukkikkum Naatkal Seekkiramaai Varum, Appozhudhu En Sagodharanaagiya Yaakkobaik Kondrupoduven Endru Esaa Than Irudhayaththile Sollik Kondaan.

42  Mooththa Maganaagiya Esaavin Vaarththaigal Rebekkaalukku Arivikkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Aval Than Ilaiya Maganaagiya Yaakkobai Azhaiththu: Un Sagodharanaagiya Esaa Unnaik Kondrupoda Ninaiththu, Thannaith Thetrikkollugiraan.
43  Aagaiyaal, En Magane, Naan Solvadhaik Kettu, Ezhundhu Purappattu, Aaraanil Irukkira En Sagodharanaagiya Laabaanidaththukku Odippoi,
44  Un Sagodharanudaiya Kobam Thaniyumattum Silanaal Avanidaththile Iru.

45  Un Sagodharan Unmel Vaiththa Kobam Thanindhu, Nee Avanukkuch Seydhadhai Avan Marandhapin, Naan Aal Anuppi, Avvidaththilirundhu Unnai Azhaippippen; Naan Ore Naalil Ungal Iruvaraiyum En Izhandhupogavendum Endraal.

46 pinbu, Rebekkaal Eesaakkai Nokki: Eththin Kumaaraththigalinimiththam En Uyir Enakku Veruppaayirukkiradhu; Indhath Dhesaththup Pengalaagiya Eththin Kumaaraththigalil Yaakkobu Oru Pennaik Kolvaanaanaal En Uyir Irundhu Aavadhenna Endraal.
